DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate long term clinical outcome patient uveitis .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients include treated uveitis repeat follow-up . Data gather entire length patient follow-up . The main outcome measure : Change baseline Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 10 year Causes vision loss ( ≤6/15 , VL ) severe vision loss ( ≤6/60 , SVL ) 10 year Number clinical visit 10 year .
DOC.criteria: Clinical Diagnosis Uveitis . No followup data .
